function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Statistically significant correlation between COVID-19 risk perception and Anxiety factor 1","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the cause of anxiety may lead to inappropriate mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to validate the correlation and consider multiple factors that contribute to anxiety","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, survey instruments","People":"Researchers, public health professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"No statistically significant correlation between COVID-19 risk perception and Anxiety factor 2","Impact":"Failure to recognize the complex nature of anxiety and its various contributing factors","Mitigation":"Explore other potential causes of general anxiety and identify its drivers","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, psychological assessments","People":"Mental health professionals, researchers, public health practitioners","Owner":"Research institutions, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Planned vacation behavior may be influenced by anxiety factors","Impact":"Misinterpretation of vacation behavior and its underlying causes, leading to ineffective interventions","Mitigation":"Consider the influence of anxiety factors on vacation behavior in the analysis and develop tailored interventions","Technologies":"Behavioral analysis tools, survey instruments","People":"Travel industry professionals, researchers, psychologists","Owner":"Travel agencies, research institutions"}]}
